turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a coffee from Peets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caffe' Mocha with whip

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want it made with soy milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do they have soy whip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no but that's fine. I still want it topped with whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will you pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: of course

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So which Peets am I calling?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Ventura Blvd. in studio city

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, okay, so a Caffe' Mocha made with soy milk but topped with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. It should be ready in a few minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've had the recipt sent to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it, thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll talk to you tomorrow, bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye
